A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
WTF ?!  confused.

This IS NOT StarWars.  

this is a B movie on its own\, certainly not our beloved\, it looks like starwars\, sounds like stawars\, but this is not starwars

Disney successfully killed this franchise with turning it into the avengers in space...couldnt tell if this was starwars 8 or the next installment of guardians of the galaxy.
they also managed to cram enough SJW crap down your throat to effectively make you never want to see another Starwars film again \, and that's not taking into account the fact that any meaningful character or story arc was killed off leaving us with a bunch of underdeveloped token characters that i don't really care what happens to.   

if you are easily amused by shiny things\, hollow action packed \, pew pew  explosion and cgi  dazzling spectacles and want to feed disney  for them to continue ruing every film they touch... by all means\, go and plink down 15$
but if you expect to see a film with any kind of thought  towards  character development\, creative  story line\, franchise continuity\, questions being answered from TFA\, or really any coherant point to this colossal waste of time i would not recommend it.  blue ray it\, or better yet pirate that shit and just stream it.  

Rian Johnson & whoever approved this gawdawful script at Disney just took a massive dump onto the whole StarWars Saga.

but thats just my opinion\, I was hyped as hell to see it \, i wish I didnt.
9 is out of the question. no more loyalty and money from me Disney. 
fool me once (TFA) shame on you\, fool me twice\, shame on me.]
